1457260.name: Masters of Puzzle - Halloween Edition: Undeadly Romance
1457260.description:
Featuring our favorite Ukraine artist Betty Elgyn, here comes a new masterpiece cleverly named Undeadly Romance. This puzzle box is part of our special Halloween Edition series and will be released during our Halloween 2020 event. Without straying from her appealing art style with which you're already familiar, the artist still manages to bring something new to our growing Halloween collection.


Apart from the usual completion achievements, this puzzle box comes with a very special and limited achievement! Make sure to complete this puzzle in any tileset configuration during the Halloween Special Event in order to get it and see what it is.


Contains one new puzzle box for Masters of Puzzle playable in variations of 250, 500, 750, 1000, 1500, 2000, and 2500 puzzle tiles. The puzzle was created from the original illustration in UHD. All the details are exactly as the artist envisioned and created them. This is a puzzle that brings a medium challenge. The central part should let you start in a structured way and continue to build towards the periphery from there. Higher puzzle tile sets will, of course, provide a greater challenge.

Also, make sure to check the other puzzle box in this year's series: Pumpkin Champion.
1457260.supported_languages: 英语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
